Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

BatteryMetrics.description: The BatteryMetrics schema contains definitions for the metrics of a battery unit.
BatteryMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the metrics of a battery unit for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

CellVoltages.description: The cell voltages (V) for this battery.
CellVoltages.longDescription: This property shall contain the cell voltages, in volt units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Voltage`.

ChargePercent.description: The amount of charge available (percent) in this battery.
ChargePercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the amount of charge available, in percent units, typically `0` to `100`, in this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Percent`.

DischargeCycles.description: The number of discharges this battery has sustained.
DischargeCycles.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of discharges this battery has sustained.

InputCurrentAmps.description: The input current (A) for this battery.
InputCurrentAmps.longDescription: This property shall contain the input current, in ampere units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Current`.

InputVoltage.description: The input voltage (V) for this battery.
InputVoltage.longDescription: This property shall contain the input voltage, in volt units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Voltage`.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OutputCurrentAmps.description: The output currents (A) for this battery.
OutputCurrentAmps.longDescription: This property shall contain the output currents, in ampere units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Current`.  The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the OutputVoltages property.

OutputVoltages.description: The output voltages (V) for this battery.
OutputVoltages.longDescription: This property shall contain the output voltages, in volt units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Voltage`.  The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the OutputCurrentAmps property.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

StoredChargeAmpHours.description: The charge (Ah) stored in this battery.
StoredChargeAmpHours.longDescription: This property shall contain the stored charge, in ampere-hour units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `ChargeAh`.

StoredEnergyWattHours.description: The energy (Wh) stored in this battery.
StoredEnergyWattHours.longDescription: This property shall contain the stored energy, in watt-hour units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `EnergyWh`.

TemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degree Celsius units, for this battery.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #BatteryMetrics.v1_0_3.BatteryMetrics
